Hello all dear teachers:
   The graduation ceremony for the 112th academic year of National Donghua University will be held on 2024/06/01 (Saturday)ğŸŠ,
We sincerely invite all dear teachers to come to the venue (gymnasium) to give blessings to the graduates.
   All teachers are cordially invited to arrive at the assembly point (Mirror Hall of the Activity Center) before 15:20 that afternoon.
    Accompanied by our president and vice-president lead the graduates into the venue, and please stop your steps when you arrive at the "teachers' blessing area". 
After welcoming the graduates into the venue, the president and vice-president will lead all the teachers to sit down together.

ğŸ’¥[Graduation Ceremony for the 112th Academic Year] 

Exclusive webpage information has been placed on the homepage of the school website. The website contains all relevant information about the graduation ceremony, welcome to inquire.
Event website: 
https://graduation.ndhu.edu.tw/p/412-1202-21431.php?Lang=zh-tw
 
Warming  invitation from the Office of Student Affairs.
